Package com.google.code.rees.scope.conversation.processing

Interface Summary
ConversationManager The primary conversation processing and management component.
ConversationPostProcessor This interface allows for post-processing of a conversation.
ConversationPostProcessorWrapper A wrapper class for ConversationPostProcessor.
ConversationPostProcessorWrapperFactory Creates ConversationPostProcessorWrappers
InjectionConversationManager Implementations of this class should implement injection of ConversationFields
 

Class Summary
ConversationEndProcessor A ConversationPostProcessor used to remove a conversation context from the session context after an action has been executed.
DefaultConversationPostProcessorWrapper The default implementation of the ConversationPostProcessorWrapper
DefaultConversationPostProcessorWrapperFactory The default implementation of the ConversationPostProcessorWrapperFactory
DefaultInjectionConversationManager The default implementation of the InjectionConversationManager
SimpleConversationManager A simple yet effective implementation of ConversationManager that manages conversation life cycles, but does not inject ConversationFields.
